product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Ramailo Shirt - Women's - Closeout
long_description: With its shirred sides, open V-neck, puff sleeves and empire waistline, the Ramailo Shirt from Sherpa Adventure Gear has the feminine touches that make you feel refreshed whenever you put it on. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking technical fabric won't wilt after a whole day in town or traveling. UPF 25 sun protection. Drawcords adjust the shirring at the sides. 2 small chest pockets with snaps are just the right size for currency and credit cards. Sleeve cuffs have snaps to adjust the circumference of their openings.
short_description: With its shirred sides, open V-neck, puff sleeves and empire waistline, the Ramailo Shirt from Sherpa Adventure Gear has the feminine touches that make you feel refreshed whenever you put it on.
